Posts.EditableText: Quest 4.0 is now available, and the website has had a bit of a revamp. You can download Quest 4.0 from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/download.htm or you can get Quest Pro from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/qreg.htm

You can download Quest 4.0 from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/download.htm

or you can get Quest Pro from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/qreg.htm

Posts.EditableText: I'm probably missing something really basic here, but when I try to run a test game I've written I'm told I can't because I haven't set a start room. To set this, I need to go Game Properties which is available by the Game menu then Properties. Only there isn't a Properties option listed under Game menu.
Posts.HTML: I'm probably missing something really basic here, but when I try to run a test game I've written I'm told I can't because I haven't set a start room. To set this, I need to go Game Properties which is available by the Game menu then Properties. Only there isn't a Properties option listed under Game menu.

Posts.EditableText:
Well spotted - some wording that needs to be updated.

Anyway, you can set the start room by clicking Game on the tree menu and then choosing a room from the "Players start in this room" list.
Posts.HTML:
Well spotted - some wording that needs to be updated.

Anyway, you can set the start room by clicking Game on the tree menu and then choosing a room from the "Players start in this room" list.
